description: The ultimate set-and-forget barbecue recipe. This slow-cooked smoky pulled lamb with crunchy slaw is the perfect combination of textures and flavours.
name: Smoky Pulled Lamb With Slaw & Pickles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a hooded barbecue on low heat. Combine celery salt, sugar, paprika, onion powder, cayenne pepper, cracked pepper and salt flakes in a small bowl.
Discard string from lamb, then place in a medium foil tray. Using back of a metal spoon, spread mustard all over lamb, then sprinkle with spice mixture.
lace tray in barbecue. Cover with hood. Cook lamb for 4 hours or until lamb has a dark crust and is tender. Remove tray from barbecue and cover with foil. Set aside for 20 minutes to rest.
Meanwhile, prepare slaw according to packet instructions. Remove lamb from tray and shred. Serve with pickles and slaw.
